replies.body:
Awwwwwwwwwww. <3

Poros + Braum 4EVS
#poro4life
Yo riot, can we make a {{champion:201}}  skin (in the near future) that's him in a giant poro costume? I believe that he thinks he's a poro in a manly-man body.
nokia shield braum
call the skin reverse braum?
And have the poro that appears in his taunt/joke/dance/laugh have the moustache so it's like braum
The poro in his joke/taunt already does have the mustache.
Poro plushie Braum? Awks.
I agree, great skin idea btw.
http://holyelfgirl.deviantart.com/art/Braum-the-savior-453963285
But the {{champion:117}} Stache
lulu looks high af
[And there's this too](http://i.imgur.com/u1Uy6g7.png)
oh my god i just pissed my pants {{item:3070}} {{item:2045}} {{item:3070}}
:c my favorite http://sh.st/epfOh

He honestly looks like the Monopoly guy.

Upvote for **Monopoly Braum **with **Monocle Poro.**
{{champion:17}} Scared the Satan out of me!
I wasn't quite scared out of you... Maybe I'm all that's left. Whelp, I'm out{{summoner:12}}
It makes {{champion:117}} 20x more hug-able.
Have my babies.
Whoa. Dude, I don't even know what kind of music you listen to.
I'm into classic rock mainly <3
Hey Riot, I 'mustache' you a question {{champion:201}}
can you "shave" it for later? {{item:1039}}

I'm pretty sure he's "tired" of waiting for the question 
{{summoner:3}}
not quite....
{{item:3023}} Maybe till 5 o'clock?
Please hire a new employee and force the name "Riot Poro" {{item:3070}}L_{{item:3070}}
Braum x Poros OTP
I'm guessing you came up with riot girl tristana skin?
I like to think she was named for me, before Riot even knew me. (So that's a no)
well then thats awesome :D

I was playing an ARAM earlier today and we managed to get the mustached Poro to explode. The thing is, the mustache didn't like that we did that, so it began wondering around on it's own.


Nothing is scarier than a floating ghost 'stache; heed my warning.

5 man gank? You mean.....Pentakill?
{{champion:201}}

Old saint Braum spreading christmas cheer,
just to end it all out with a great beer,
however to the league called was he,
to fight for freljord oh why me,
down to bot lane he pushed with ashe,
trying to stun lucian but he just dashed,
Down goes the lucian they won the lane!,
but oh look, here comes a vayne,
They realize quickly shes on a spree,
Braum shouts quick ashe STAND BY ME,
Braum shielded ashe as she began to take aim,
Vayne had become a beast that one could not tame,
Ashe let go and prayed for a hit,
vayne went down, it was a crit,
with a wall so large and full of power,
Braum took down the enemy tower,
The team grouped mid and began to fuss,
Braum looked at ashe, it's up to us,
There he stood in the cold winter night,
Stand by me friends, its time to fight.


put a comma where each line ends.

http://24.media.tumblr.com/71af9bbc721f151b61c2b4beb00c073c/tumblr_n5iz653TVS1r6o1dao1_1280.jpg

Shield buddies by[ SuuArt](http://suqling.tumblr.com/)

Stay Calm
and
Stay Behind Braum
{{champion:201}} I got you covered: http://i.imgur.com/LM6aFy7.jpg
Male players got {{champion:103}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:21}}.  Muscle man{{champion:201}} + cute Poros~~ for the female LoL Players
Bad Wacalac! Braum does **NOT** look evil!
This is clearly the face of braum after someone harms a poro. Braum shall seek justice and retribution for all that harm poros! {{summoner:14}} + {{champion:201}}
Braum is totally evil he has a mustache... whats more evil than that?
Obviously you are the evil one.   {{summoner:11}}

I didn't know we could submit fan art of braum! Here's a piece I did last week from my tumblr site. I'm also on instagram: @themattvincent
You know... I suddenly just remembered who Brawm reminds me of. XD That one guy from Full Metal Alchemist... ah.. what's his name... oh oh Major Armstrong! >:3
When I see Braum holding them Poros it makes me wanna {{item:3070}}
definatly wish there could be a major armstrong braum
Oh God. The fingers. People can draw fingers so well, I'm jealous. ; u ;
**Poros** are *always* {{summoner:6}} to {{champion:201}}  for them** snaxx!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!**
How The A-BRAUM-INABLE snowman for a skin idea!!
